original_text: For although they knew God, they neither glorified him as God nor gave thanks to him, but their thinking became futile and their foolish hearts were darkened.
korean_text: 하나님을 알되 하나님을 영화롭게도 아니하며 감사하지도 아니하고 오히려 그 생각이 허망하여지며 미련한 마음이 어두워졌나니

sentences.original_text: they neither glorified him as God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님으로서 그를 영화롭게 하지 않았고

sentences.original_text: and their foolish hearts were darkened
